A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great Star Wars movie! It was nice to see something different. I don't understand why so many people have issues with it. The critics have it right this time. A well done movie! Think of it this way\, if Star Wars 4-6 didn't exist then this movie would have gotten 5 stars from everyone. People are judging these movies too much on the past! If you like movies\, then you should really really enjoy this one!
